channel.title: Client white screen
channel.description:
[code]Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2196 | java.lang.Runtime Exception[/code]
This is what is in the .bat file that load the client. No matter the client this occurs. If you can help Ill appreciate So Yeah Help Please.
Where do I add the Cache?
